info.title: Product Allocation Sequence
info.description: You can use this service to read header data for a specific product allocation sequence (including its description) as well as read, edit and delete any assigned product and product-location assignments.

x-sap-shortText: Use this service to read header data and read, edit and delete assignments for a specific product allocation sequence

parameters.name: ProdAllocSqncAssignmentUUID
parameters.description:
Product Allocation Sequence Assignment UUID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)
